definition: a place famous for its scenery or historical relics/scenic spot/CL:處|处[chu4]
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)
Jiuzhaigou Valley Scenic and Historical Interest Area, Sichuan
pinyin: Jiu3 zhai4 gou1 Feng1 jing3 ming2 sheng4 qu1

sentences.english: Tainan and its surrounding area have many places of historical interest to visit.
sentences.chinese: 臺南和其周圍地區有許多歷史名勝可遊覽。

sentences.english: The main draw in agra is of course the taj mahal.
sentences.chinese: 印度阿格拉市主要的名勝當然是泰姬陵了。

sentences.english: There are many places of interesting in Jing tai.
Shennongjia is a famous national scenic spot.
sentences.chinese: 神農架是全國著名的風景名勝。

sentences.english: London has many attractions, such as Big Ben and Buckingham Palace.
sentences.chinese: 倫敦有許多名勝，例如大笨鐘和白金漢宮。

sentences.english: Do you know any places of renown around here?
sentences.chinese: 你知道這兒有什麼名勝地嗎？

sentences.english: Yanshan eight sceneries" is the general designation of eight scenic spots of Beijing."
sentences.chinese: 燕山八景是北京的八處風景名勝的統稱。

sentences.english: All the places of interest in Suzhou have been marked in bright purple on the map.
sentences.chinese: 蘇州所有的名勝在地圖上都已用亮紫色標出來了。

sentences.english: The Town Council spent a lot of money in preserving the old castle and other places of interest.
sentences.chinese: 市委員會花了不少錢來保護那座古城堡和其他名勝。

sentences.english: Shengsi is a unique island scenic spot national level in China.
sentences.chinese: 嵊泗是中國唯一的國家級列島風景名勝區。

sentences.english: The streets about the castle are full of places of historic interest.
sentences.chinese: 城堡周圍的街道上淨是名勝古蹟。

sentences.english: Jue in Moonlight is one of the four wonders in Jincheng.
sentences.chinese: “珏山吐月”爲晉城四大名勝之一。

sentences.english: The sixth chapter is the analysis of the integration of Fengdu scenic spot resources.
sentences.chinese: 豐都名山風景名勝區資源整合的對策分析。

sentences.english: A: Would you recommend some places for sightseeing ?
sentences.chinese: 您能給我推薦一些遊覽名勝嗎？

sentences.english: With a long history, the city has many historical and scenic spots.
sentences.chinese: 由於歷史悠久，這個城市有許多歷史和風景名勝。

sentences.english: The ancient town of Lijiang is a most wonderful sight.
sentences.chinese: 麗江古城是最着名的名勝。

definition: holy land (of a religion)/sacred place/shrine/holy city (such as Jerusalem, Mecca etc)/center of historic interest

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Wen2 hua4 Yi2 chan3

definition: a hot tourist attraction/a tourist trap
